mapper.insert: insert into `file_upload` (user_id, user_type, file_name, file_type, file_path, upload_date, code) values (#{userId}, #{userType}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{filePath}, #{uploadDate}, #{code})
mapper.update: update `file_upload` set user_id = #{userId}, user_type = #{userType}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_type = #{fileType}, file_path = #{filePath}, upload_date = #{uploadDate}, code = #{code} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, user_type, file_name, file_type, file_path, upload_date, code from `file_upload`
